code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Login from'./Login.jsx';import SignUp from'./SignUp.jsx';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Auth=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[isLogin,setIsLogin]=useState(true);const handleLogin=user=>{onLogin(user);};const handleSignup=user=>{onLogin(user);};const switchToSignup=()=>{setIsLogin(false);};const switchToLogin=()=>{setIsLogin(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900",children:isLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin,onSwitchToSignup:switchToSignup}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUp,{onSignup:handleSignup,onSwitchToLogin:switchToLogin})});};export default Auth;
